queries.query: select count(distinct e.patient_hid) as v1 from encounter e, patient p where facility_id=:FACILITY: and e.patient_hid=p.patient_hid and e.patient_age_years >= :MIN_YEAR: and e.patient_age_years < :MAX_YEAR: and p.gender=':GENDER:' and e.visit_type=':VISIT_TYPE:' and encounter_datetime=':ENC_DATE:';

select count(distinct e.patient_hid) as v2 from encounter e, patient p where facility_id=:FACILITY: and e.patient_hid=p.patient_hid and e.patient_age_years >= :MIN_YEAR: and e.patient_age_years < :MAX_YEAR: and p.gender=':GENDER2:' and e.visit_type=':VISIT_TYPE:' and encounter_datetime=':ENC_DATE:';
